Force of Balance.name: Force of Balance
Force of Balance.fullText:
Elemental Anchorite Attack 11Force of Balance

You strike with perfectly measured force, using elemental power to maximize the impact of your attack.

Encounter        Elemental
No Action      Special

Trigger: You hit an enemy with an elemental attack power.

Effect: The triggering attack deals 1[W] extra damage if it is a weapon attack or 1d8 extra damage if it is not a weapon attack, and the target falls prone.


Published in Heroes of the Elemental Chaos, page(s) 125.
Force of Balance.flavor: You strike with perfectly measured force, using elemental power to maximize the impact of your attack.
Force of Balance.trigger: You hit an enemy with an elemental attack power.
Force of Balance.effect: The triggering attack deals 1[W] extra damage if it is a weapon attack or 1d8 extra damage if it is not a weapon attack, and the target falls prone.

Elemental Transcendence.name: Elemental Transcendence
Elemental Transcendence.fullText:
Elemental Anchorite Attack 20Elemental Transcendence

You draw upon the matter surrounding you to increase the intensity of your elemental attacks.

Daily        Elemental, Stance
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You assume the elemental transcendence stance. Until the stance ends, your elemental weapon attacks deal 1[W] extra damage, and your elemental nonweapon attacks deal 1d8 extra damage. In addition, any enemy that ends its turn adjacent to you takes 10 damage.


Published in Heroes of the Elemental Chaos, page(s) 125.
Elemental Transcendence.flavor: You draw upon the matter surrounding you to increase the intensity of your elemental attacks.
Elemental Transcendence.effect: You assume the elemental transcendence stance. Until the stance ends, your elemental weapon attacks deal 1[W] extra damage, and your elemental nonweapon attacks deal 1d8 extra damage. In addition, any enemy that ends its turn adjacent to you takes 10 damage.

Shielding Element.name: Shielding Element
Shielding Element.fullText:
Elemental Anchorite Utility 12Shielding Element

You retain the energy of an elemental attack, shaping it into a short-lived shield to protect yourself.

Encounter        Elemental, Varies
Minor Action      Personal

Requirement: You must have hit an enemy with an acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder attack during this turn.

Effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain resist 10 to one damage type of the attack (one of the types noted above). In addition, any enemy that hits you with a melee attack before the end of your next turn takes 10 damage of that type.


Published in Heroes of the Elemental Chaos, page(s) 125.
Shielding Element.flavor: You retain the energy of an elemental attack, shaping it into a short-lived shield to protect yourself.
Shielding Element.requirement: You must have hit an enemy with an acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder attack during this turn.
Shielding Element.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain resist 10 to one damage type of the attack (one of the types noted above). In addition, any enemy that hits you with a melee attack before the end of your next turn takes 10 damage of that type.
